text: Hmm, I’m not that familiar with the app installation API or the app installation process in general. That might be worth a separate post here or in <#C2YHAHB6K|api> so that someone who’s more familiar could help
Hola a todos, hi, necesitamos saber si HubSpot permite consumir un API en javascript el API es para integrarnos con Keycloack.
```Hello everyone, hi, we need to know if HubSpot allows us to consume an API in javascript, the API is to integrate with Keycloack.```

Yes, You can use HubSpot API’s in Javascript
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/create_contact>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
Does anyone know how to sort data alphabetically in a HubDB loop child table?

I’m not sure of any direct way, But you may want to try this
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/HubDB-rearrange-order/idi-p/5167>

Copied from above link.
```{% set queryparam = "&orderBy=-name_of_your_column_where_is_the_name_of_team_member" %}

note that after = there is a - (minus) character and this is to display the team in descending order (from Z -to A) but if you want the order with ascending order then delete le - (minus) character```
I need your advise if we have specific request/response or its JSON in both
